name: MEC Reactor Junior 2.5 Sleeping Pad - Children to Youths
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: A Reactor Pad that's sized for kids. Offers a great night's sleep and it comes with a trails-and-streams board game printed on the surface (a riff on snakes-and-ladders)  and a set of Sasquatch/Yeti game pieces. Great for rainy days or kids who wake up at 5am. Durable construction, and it's well-priced too!Face fabric is polyester.Non-slip surface on the underside prevents sliding in the tent.Foam has horizontal cut-outs to reduce weight and packed size while retaining insulation.Oversized valve makes inflation and deflation easy, and closes with a single twist.Includes a stuff sack with printed game instructions and a pocket for the die and game pieces.
